traceability.title: Traceability information
traceability.description: A link to traceability information about the product.

recipeInfo.title: Recipe website
recipeInfo.description: A link to a recipe website for the product.

promotion.title: Promotion
promotion.description: A link to a promotion for the product.

ingredientsInfo.title: Ingredients information
ingredientsInfo.description: A document providing facts about the product's ingredients.

consumerHandlingStorageInfo.title: Consumer handling and storage information
consumerHandlingStorageInfo.description: A link to information about safe handling and storage of the product.

epcis.title: EPCIS repository
epcis.description: A link to an EPCIS repository of visibility event data.

masterData.title: Master data
masterData.description: A link to a source of structured master data for the entity. This is typically for B2B applications, rather than for consumers, and likely to be subject to access control.

verificationService.title: Verification Service
verificationService.description: A link to a service for verifying the status of a product and its identifier.  This value of linkType is used with implementations of the GS1 Lightweight Verification Messaging Standard.

registerProduct.title: Register purchase
registerProduct.description: A link to an entry point for registering ownership of a product including for warranty purposes.

certificationInfo.title: Certification information
certificationInfo.description: A link to certification information about the product.

smpc.title: Summary product characteristics (SmPC)
smpc.description: Link to Summary Product Characteristics for healthcare professionals.

smartLabel.title: SmartLabel
smartLabel.description: A link to the product's SmartLabel page.

serviceInfo.title: Service information
serviceInfo.description: A document that provides service or maintenance instructions for the item.

safetyInfo.title: Safety information
safetyInfo.description: A document, video or graphic that provides safety information about the item

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: A link to a set of frequently asked questions.

hasRetailers.title: Retailers
hasRetailers.description: A link to a list of retailers for this item

purchaseSuppliesOrAccessories.title: Purchase supplies or accessories
purchaseSuppliesOrAccessories.description: A link to a page where supplies or accessories for the item can be purchased or ordered.

brandHomepageClinical.title: More information for professionals about this brand
brandHomepageClinical.description: Link to brand presence aimed at clinical professionals.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.description: A link to a tutorial or set of tutorials, such as online classes, how-to videos etc.

handledBy.title: Handled by
handledBy.description: Used when one resolver redirects all request URIs that match a given pattern without further processing, such as from GS1 to a brand-operated service

support.title: Support
support.description: A link to a source of support such as a helpdesk, chat support, email etc.

pip.title: Product information page
pip.description: A document that provides information about the identified item, typically operated by the brand owner or a retailer of the product. It may include links to further information, product description, specifications etc. N.B. The page may be human or machine readable, or a combination of the two (such as an HTML page with embedded structured data).

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: A document, video or graphic that provides instructions related to the item, including assembly instructions, usage tips etc.

brandHomepagePatient.title: More information for patients about this brand
brandHomepagePatient.description: Link to a brand presence aimed at patients.

epil.title: Patient information
epil.description: Link to an electronic patient information leaflet.

socialMedia.title: Social media
socialMedia.description: A link to a social media channel. The title will typically be replaced by the name of the channel.

recallStatus.title: Recall status
recallStatus.description: A link to information about whether the product has been recalled or not, typically an API.

activityIdeas.title: Activity ideas
activityIdeas.description: Ideas for using the product, particularly with children.

review.title: Review
review.description: A link to one or more reviews of the product or service.

quickStartGuide.title: Quick start guide
quickStartGuide.description: A document, video or graphic that shows the key features needed to be understood to begin using the item.

productSustainabilityInfo.title: sustainability and recycling
productSustainabilityInfo.description: Information about the productís sustainability of manufacture, recycling information etc.

nutritionalInfo.title: Nutritional information
nutritionalInfo.description: A document providing nutritional facts about the product.

whatsInTheBox.title: What's in the box
whatsInTheBox.description: A document describing all the individual items in a packaged item.

leaveReview.title: Leave a review
leaveReview.description: A link through which a review can be added.

allergenInfo.title: Allergen information
allergenInfo.description: A document describing the allergens in the product.
